setting.location: University laboratory rooftop in Warsaw, Congress Poland, elevated scientific workspace overlooking city
setting.weather: Clear dawn with first light breaking

characters.appearance: Young scientist in late 20s, brown hair, determined expression
characters.clothing: Laboratory coat over rumpled clothes, suggesting all-night work
characters.position: Standing at rooftop edge adjusting large experimental apparatus
characters.action: Preparing elaborate balloon experiment with gas canisters and equipment

characters.appearance: Man in early 40s, exhausted appearance, hollow cheeks, but spark returning to eyes
characters.clothing: Wrinkled suit, coat draped over shoulders
characters.position: Sitting on crate watching the preparation
characters.action: Operating gas valve while studying technical drawings

scene.mainElements: Rooftop laboratory with experimental balloon apparatus being prepared at dawn, two men working together on scientific project, city awakening below
scene.details: Large silk balloon partially inflated, brass gas canisters with gauges, coiled rubber tubes, wooden framework supporting experiment, notebooks weighted with tools, chemical apparatus, telescope on tripod, dawn light turning everything golden, birds beginning to fly, smoke rising from chimneys below, no text or letters visible
scene.background: Warsaw cityscape spreading in all directions, church spires catching first light, Vistula River like silver ribbon
scene.atmosphere: Renewal through scientific purpose, hope returning with the dawn, friendship and shared vision

composition.cameraAngle: Wide shot showing rooftop laboratory against dawn sky
composition.focus: The two men united in scientific endeavor as day breaks
composition.depth: Experimental apparatus in foreground, men working in middle, cityscape in background

lineArt.weight: very fine, built up in layers
